Create or Destroy Water

Level 1 Transmutation Spell

Call forth rain or destroy a water-based.

Create or Destroy Water is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Create or Destroy Water is a Lvl 1 Spell from the Transmutation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Baldur's Gate 3 Create or Destroy Water Information

Description: Call forth rain or destroy a water-based. Level: Lvl 1 Spell School: Transmutation Casting Time: Action Range: 9m 4m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: None

How to Acquire Create or Destroy Water in BG 3

Create or Destroy Water can be acquired by the following classes: Druid, Cleric, Storm Sorcery (Lvl 6 Sorcerer Subclass) Create or Destroy Water can be cast by using the following Items: Rain Dancer

Druid, Cleric, Storm Sorcery (Lvl 6 Sorcerer Subclass)

Create or Destroy Water Tips & Notes for BG 3

Upcast: When cast with a 2nd level spell slot or higher, the radius increases by 2m for each slot level above 1st. Create water applies the Wet condition: Vulnerability to Cold and Lightning damage (double damage). Lightning Spells cast on water causes the Shocked condition: Removing their reaction and having a chance to stun. Electrified Water + a Fire Spell causes Electrified Steam, which resets the Shocked and Wet conditions. A Cold spell freezes the water/mist and creates an Ice Surface, causing Difficult Terrain (half Movement Speed) and may cause creatures in the area to fall Prone unless succeeding a DEX Save. E.g. Create Water + Glyph of Warding combo.
